title: Musk brings back Twitter Blue with new features to prevent impersonation
description: Reuters reviewed an email to advertisers saying Twitter Blue is back Friday.

title: RIP Passwords? Passkey support rolls out to Chrome stable
description: With a huge list of caveats, initial Google passkey support is here.

title: AI image generation tech can now create life-wrecking deepfakes with ease
description: AI tech makes it trivial to generate harmful fake photos from a few social media pictures.

title: A Schoolhouse Rock! tribute to honor the passing of its last surviving creator
description: George Newall, a former ad exec who co-created the influential series, has died at 88.

title: Linux-ready Launch Heavy is a $300 mechanical keyboard for number crunchers
description: System76's $300 Launch Heavy has open source hardware and software, plus a USB hub.

title: Trashed lithium-ion batteries caused three garbage truck fires in California
description: Do batteries really cause garbage fires? Only three times in one month.

title: Disgraced FTX founder to testify at House hearing on crypto exchange crash
description: After missing a Senate deadline, FTX founder tweets, "I am willing to testify."

title: Ohio measles outbreak hits partially vaccinated kids, babies too young for shots
description: Some children who got their first shot may not yet be eligible for their second.

title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4080 review: Second only to the 4090—for now
description: Price-to-performance is a bit better than the 4090, if you can find it at $1,200.

title: NASA’s Orion spacecraft is about to face its final test—and it’s a big one
description: "Reentry is our priority-one objective for a reason."

title: Rocket Report: Starship flight test slips to 2023; first methane launch is imminent
description: "We need some adult supervision there to actually help these guys."

title: “The Game Awards” Awards: Picking the night’s best new game trailers
description: Hades and Death Stranding sequels, Bioshock's spiritual successor, and more.
